DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study perform clinical test PowerFoot group individual trans-tibial amputation objective optimize performance compare current state-of-art passive-elastic ankle-foot prosthesis , i.e . Ceterus Flex-Foot .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator measure performance level ground walk simulate uneven terrain . The investigator also compare metabolic cost self-selected gait speed PowerFoot versus traditional Ceterus Flex-Foot . Tasks include : - Perform biomechanical analysis ( kinematic kinetic gait parameter ) PowerFoot Ceterus group individual trans-tibial amputation level walking , ramp ambulation , stair ambulation . - Compare laboratory field performance PowerFoot Ceterus .
DOC.criteria: weigh 200 lbs high level ambulators correspond level E F Special Interest Group Amputee Medicine ( SIGAM ) mobility grade ability follow multistep command . score level D SIGAM mobility grade experience 1 fall last month study residual limb length allow seven inch clearance bracket attachment PowerFoot residual limb must stable volume ( change socket socket pad last 6 month ) without pain limit function soundside ( contralateral ) low extremity must free impediment affect gait , range motion , limb muscle activity Any diagnose cardiovascular , pulmonary , neurological , and/ orthopedic condition would interfere subject participation
